summary: This document is an email chain from May 2021 between individuals coordinating an interview related to an FBI 302 report. The correspondence discusses scheduling an interview with a witness or subject, involving their attorney, and the potential participation of a third party identified as C-20.

persons.name: C-20
persons.context: Mentioned as someone who wants to sit in on an interview but is described as 'totally swamped,' indicating scheduling difficulties.

events.title: Email coordination for interview
events.description: An email is sent to coordinate scheduling an interview, mentioning the need to speak to an attorney first and the potential participation of C-20.

keyFacts: The document references an FBI 302 report being passed between parties.
Coordination is underway to interview a female subject, with plans to contact her attorney first.
A third party, C-20, expressed interest in attending the interview but has scheduling conflicts.
